奥德赛活动一定要落实，不然要吃大亏
项目发币了也不能松懈，准备好二次空投

好好做面包，面包都会有的

好好做面包，面包才会有的

但剩者为王 https://t.co/YYp2wq5DHU

articles.author: 链求君 | (C,C)
articles.description:
据说今天俄罗斯内乱。 
苏联解体后的1991年到1994年在原苏联加盟国间形成的一个短时期货币同盟。卢布区的国家使用同一种货币，先是苏联卢布，然后是俄罗斯卢布。随着各国陆续放弃使用卢布，转而发行本国的货币，这一货币联盟也随之崩溃。
俄罗斯平民可能集体梭哈比特币！ https://twitter.com/CausMoney/status/1672391688097087489

加美财经caus.com: 俄罗斯军方和安全部门指责瓦格纳雇佣兵老板普里戈津试图发动政变
#乌克兰战争 #俄罗斯 俄罗斯将军们周五晚些时候指控瓦格纳雇佣兵老板叶夫根尼·普里戈津试图对普京发
http://m.caus.com/detail/77186 https://t.co/LwyT0tJKPL

articles.author: DeFi Educator
articles.description:
Re @hufhaus9 Devil is in the details. If blackrock doesn’t own BTC. But their clients own via blackrock 51% of the network, then a hardfork would make blackrock owner and give them choice 
https://twitter.com/jratcliff/status/1669937251286126592?s=46&t=cM-600GJga7XNxddNsm-Pw

John W. Ratcliff: There is a strange point with the wording in that BlackRock ETF about hard forks.
Traditionally, when a hard fork occurs, users get tokens on *both* forks. Large exchanges have generally honored this for custodial tokens.
However, that's not what the BlackRock ETF says. It says… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1669937251286126592

articles.author: DeFi Educator
articles.description:
RT Justin Slaughter
So, I respectfully disagree with Noelle on this one. I think BlackRock is doing this on the merits (seeking to get a bitcoin ETF approved) rather than trying to send a political message. 
Bear with me, because this is complicated in terms of Democratic politics.

Noelle Acheson: My take on the BlackRock BTC ETF filing:
- **BIG** news - BlackRock is the world's largest asset manager
- It’s not going to happen
- BlackRock knows this
- Rather, it is sending a political message
- Larry Fink is a prominent Democrat
https://www.coindesk.com/business/2023/06/15/blackrocks-ishares-files-paperwork-for-spot-bitcoin-etf/
